name: projecttrackr
description: ProjectTrackr is a comprehensive project management application that helps teams efficiently track, manage, and collaborate on projects and tasks. It provides a user-friendly interface with powerful features to streamline project workflows, enhance team communication, and improve productivity

scripts.package: printf 'Enter the name of the application folder: ' && read folder_name && printf 'Enter the name of the package to install: ' && read package_name && npm install --workspace $folder_name $package_name
